define whether to allow reader to perform complex filtering operations in the screen version of the table

Components.EditionForm.Explanation about: An edition targeting printed outputs and PDF reading experiences
An edition targeting web outputs for reading on mobile and fixed screens
A template oriented toward a combination between sequential, deep reading, and horizontal navigation through multiple mentions of a given resource.
A flexible and modular template made for producing specific print experiences out of the content of the production
Work description that you can use to remember the context and purpose of this particular edition
Work title used for identifying this edition
A simple template oriented toward in-progress or corpus-oriented publications. It allows to display different lists of resources as browsable cards.
A column-based layout template oriented toward visualizing relationship between several kinds of resources.

A blank page in the edition
This is the page that would be displayed on the top of a printed object
List of glossary entries mobilized in the edition, and links to their mentions in contents
List of resources mobilized in the edition, scholarly formatted according to edition's formatting styles choices, and links to their mentions in contents
Interactive network map of resources mobilized in the edition, linked by their common mentions in sections
Core contents of the edition - it can mirror the production's default sections order or be a custom selection
Interactive summary of the contents of this edition
